meanings.definition: To specialize in a particular subfield or area of expertise.
meanings.sent3: He subspecializes in fixing tiny hearts.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise subspecializes in intricate brain surgeries.
meanings.sent5: The professor subspecializes in teaching advanced mathematics.

meanings.definition: To focus on a specific aspect within a broader field.
meanings.sent1: The chef subspecializes in vegan desserts.
meanings.sent2: He subspecializes in analyzing market trends.
meanings.sent3: She subspecializes in finding the best deals.
meanings.sent4: His attention subspecializes in detecting subtle changes.
meanings.sent5: The detective subspecializes in solving complex puzzles.
